synthesis_conditions.equipment: 20 mL borosilicate vial on a hot plate well
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Soaked in fresh DMA at 60 °C for 12 h, repeated once. Then soaked in MeOH at 60 °C, decanted and replaced with fresh MeOH three times over 2 days.
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Dried in vacuo at 60 °C in the glovebox
synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: The resulting green solid slowly became brown in color. The vial was then sealed and transferred to a wet, O2-free glovebox filled with a Praxair Hydrostar (5% H2 in N2) gas mixture.

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Soaked in fresh MeOH at room temperature, repeated four times over 24 h.
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Dried in the glovebox in vacuo at 80 °C
synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: Yields CuII-MFU-4l-formate as a light green powder.

synthesis_conditions.temperature: Heated in vacuo at 100 °C for 12 h, then ramped at 2 °C/min to 180 °C, held for 3 h.
synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: Between 120–180 °C, extensive offgassing occurs, and the sample changes in color from light green to beige.
